name: 3dQwarp
author: AFNI Team
description: Computes a nonlinearly warped version of source_dataset to match base_dataset.

inputs.description: Base dataset
inputs.name: Base Dataset

inputs.description: Source dataset
inputs.name: Source Dataset

inputs.description: Prefix for the output datasets
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Do not save the _WARP file
inputs.name: No Warp

inputs.description: Compute and save the _WARPINV file
inputs.name: Inverse Warp

inputs.description: Do not save the warped source dataset
inputs.name: No Dataset

inputs.description: Output the nonlinear warp when -allineate is used
inputs.name: Affine Warp

inputs.description: Clipped Pearson correlation (default method)
inputs.name: Clipped Pearson Correlation

inputs.description: Use strict Pearson correlation for matching
inputs.name: Pearson Correlation

inputs.description: Use Hellinger metric for matching
inputs.name: Hellinger Metric

inputs.description: Use Mutual Information for matching
inputs.name: Mutual Information

inputs.description: Use Normalized Mutual Information for matching
inputs.name: Normalized Mutual Information

inputs.description: Use Local Pearson correlation (signed) for matching
inputs.name: Local Pearson Correlation (Signed)

inputs.description: Use Local Pearson correlation (absolute value) for matching
inputs.name: Local Pearson Correlation (Absolute Value)

inputs.description: Replace negative values in either input volume with 0
inputs.name: Replace Negative Values

inputs.description: Don't use a penalty on the cost functional
inputs.name: No Penalty

inputs.description: Set the minimum patch size for warp searching
inputs.name: Minimum Patch Size

inputs.description: Set the maximum refinement level
inputs.name: Maximum Refinement Level

inputs.description: Print out very verbose progress messages
inputs.name: Verbose

inputs.description: Cut out most progress messages
inputs.name: Quiet
